general.about: I use data to make fulfillment easier and faster, helping Samsara's customers keep the world of physical operations safe, efficient, and sustainable.

sideProjects.heading: inreach
sideProjects.description: Designed, prototyped, and pitched a CRM app for my introductory informatics class.
sideProjects.title: inreach

sideProjects.heading: Houserules
sideProjects.description: Caltech Hacktech Hackathon subission. Led the ideation + design of a mobile app that tracks appliance use for shared households.
sideProjects.title: Houserules

workExperience.heading: Supply Chain Analyst at Samsara
workExperience.description: Driving AI adoption in advanced supply-chain decisionmaking.
workExperience.title: Supply Chain Analyst

workExperience.heading: Operations Intern at Samsara
workExperience.description:
Creating Salesforce and Excel models in service of improving order fulfillment.

Previously analyzed 20k+ datapoints to reformulate hardware shipping cost calculations for the US/CAN, Mexico, and EMEA regions, saving 200 hours annually.
workExperience.title: Operations Intern

workExperience.heading: Project Management Intern at Starbucks
workExperience.description: Coded an interactive calendar app displaying business rhythms across a 450-person shared services organization.
workExperience.title: Project Management Intern

workExperience.heading: Project Management Intern at Fiveable
workExperience.description:
Standardized support ticketing, resulting in an 85% decrease in average time to resolution.

Led creation of user education that increased month-over-month participation in a cohort-based program by 25%.

Created a process to audit vendor spend, saving $30k the year it was implemented.

Created trainings and instructional documents to educate 50+ employees on new project management software.
workExperience.title: Project Management Intern

workExperience.heading: Leadership Development Intern for The Foster School of Business
workExperience.description:
Created this first-of-its-kind internship.

Made changes to curriculum and scheduling that increased the course completion rate by 50% compared to the last cohort.
workExperience.title: Leadership Development Intern

Extracurriculars.heading: Senior Vice President at Delta Sigma Pi
Extracurriculars.description: Led recruiting efforts for DSP, a professional fraternity facilitating professional development & community building.
Extracurriculars.title: Senior VP

Extracurriculars.heading: Cofounder of UW Product/Project/Program Management Association
Extracurriculars.description: Co-founded a student group interested in careers within product, program, and project management.
Extracurriculars.title: Founding Member

Extracurriculars.heading: Vice President at Husky Run Club
Extracurriculars.description: Led efforts to raise $9000 for UW's run club. Managed spending, fundraising, and record-keeping.
Extracurriculars.title: VP

education.heading: BA, Business Administration at University of Washington
education.description: Sometimes went to class. Always drank coffee.
